name: Arugula Piña Colada Smoothie
description: Pineapple and coconut milk are traditional partners in piña colada, so why not combine them in something that’s really good for you in this lunchtime smoothie?
keywords: arugula, coconut milk, pineapple, dairy-free, gluten-free, healthy, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, winter

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend for 1 full minute. Pour into a glass, garnish with an orange slice and enjoy.
